author: kondratyevd
body:
#### PR description:

This PR implements new approach to seeding in outside-in L3 muon reconstruction.
The new plugin `TSGForOIDNN` is based on the design of [TSGForOIFromL2 plugin](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/RecoMuon/TrackerSeedGenerator/plugins/TSGForOIFromL2.cc), with multiple changes and additions described in detail in [presentation at Muon POG meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1073323/contributions/4513876/attachments/2303367/3918362/Purdue_muonHLT_sep6.pdf).

The main changes include: 
 * A new type of seeds created from doublets of hits in outer tracker.
* The number of seeds of each type to create for each muon can be obtained by evaluating a DNN model which takes L2 muon parameters as inputs. One of two DNN architectures (classifier or regressor) can be used. The trained models and necessary data are provided externally; the latest models are added by this PR: 
https://github.com/cms-data/RecoMuon-TrackerSeedGenerator/pull/2.

The PR contains three new files.
* The plugin code:
	`RecoMuon/TrackerSeedGenerator/plugins/TSGForOIDNN.cc`
	`RecoMuon/TrackerSeedGenerator/plugins/TSGForOIDNN.h`
* Example of configuration:
	`RecoMuon/TrackerSeedGenerator/python/customizeOIseeding.py`


#### PR validation:

The performance of the new methods has been presented at Muon POG meeting [[link](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1073323/contributions/4513876/attachments/2303367/3918362/Purdue_muonHLT_sep6.pdf)].
title: DNN-based optimization of seeding in outside-in sequence of Muon HLT
